attributes.action: Enquiry into alleged abuses of public funds by the European Research Group
attributes.background: No action seems to take place over allegations of the ERG's use of taxpayers' money for prohibited political purposes. Parliament should authorise an enquiry and take action over its findings.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for making decisions about MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government. You can find out how to contact the Compliance Officer for IPSA here:

http://www.parliamentarycompliance.org.uk/makingacomplaint/Pages/default.aspx
